name: places/ChIJd0A9_fP3wokRu3H7kl9sUH8
formattedAddress: Madison Av/E 116 St, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: Madison Av/E 116 St, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text:
How are these drivers allowed to drive kids to school?
They have no clue about safety.
The driver of the unit RV1138 rushed to take a sharp right turn, saw me on the crosswalk and chose to keep going, making me run  back and almost getting hit by the rear of the bus, all this to get a car length down the street where he stopped at the next red light followed by a full stop to drop off a child.
Would definitely consider a different bus company to drive your kids to school and back home.
The driver saw me on the crosswalk and chose to keep going while making a sharp right turn, keep in mind that there is a school nearby and kids go across this crosswalk everyday I’m surprised that this driver hasn’t hit anyone yet.

originalText.text: Reliant Transportation Bus RV 2617 on Wednesday March 16, 2022 was driving east on 42nd Street between 5th Ave passing Grand Central Station with the horn blaring non-stop and weaving in and out of vehicles and then dangerously tailgating two bicyclists.  The female driver was completely out of control! Thankfully it appeared the bus appeared empty. These drivers are transporting children???!!!!???

originalText.text: If I could leave a 0 I would. I have never had to deal with an more unprofessional group of people in all my IEP days. I have no idea how they get to keep their license.

originalText.text: This company hires irresponsable and disrespectful drivers for example the woman driving bus number RV2806 plate number 18209 BB was asked by School Safety to up and over to allow traffic to flow and she refused to move unnecessarily block off the traffic causing a line to form all the way down to the avenue, when asked by one by a driver that was trying to complete his route as well as the School safety officer to please move she just said "I'm not moving" despite have space to pull over to the side and allow traffic to pass
